TopicTitle: Would you like a weekly KSP Web Show series?

Articles.Content:
Having watched the KSP update 'movies' (Selection process and Kerbal Science), I have been to youtube and in the comments many posters said they would love to see it as a TV/Web show.

Wait for the pole:

Having watched the KSP update 'movies' (Selection process and Kerbal Science), I have been to youtube and in the comments many posters said they would love to see it as a TV/Web show.

Wait for the pole:

Not going to happen. I'm sure a considerable amount of time goes into making them (animations, etc etc) so the only way this could ever become a reality is if a fan/group of fans do it.

Anything official will only take a large chunk of time from development.

It should come from the community not from the devs. I've rather have them spend time on the game than on videos.

Besides that, I love the little videos by Squad, if we have them every week I think I'll get bored with it. Now its still cool "Woohoo Squad has a new KSP video! Can't wait to see it!"
I know that it probably wont happen and every week would be a bit much; but a 5 minute vid every month or so would be cool.
